name: Nenad M.
review_header: Review after 1 year using Cherry Servers
review_body: I used their dedicated servers for a year and this is my opinion of Cherry Servers. During the time I used the server there were only 3 maintenances from the server provider and every time it happened I was informed at least a day before. Surprisingly it never interfered with my services and I ran the server without any problems. Their support is great and ready to help. For example I had a problem with the payment not going through and lucky me I decided to do the payment the last day. I reached out to support about the problem and they extended the period by 24 hours plus they helped with the payment go through. Their support team usually responds quickly. Their prices are very reasonable for the quality of service they provide. So here are my pros and cons about using Cherry Servers Pros: - Great customer support - Very dependable servers, there wasn't a single hiccup in a year - Servers can additionally get configured if you need any more RAM or Storage space for example, or maybe you need more Backup storage or maybe you need a GPU - They do have some basic "how to set up" guides that could be helpful for beginners - If you are into crypto or are doing some crypto related stuff than this info will be useful: Cherry Servers is pro crypto and they accept crypto payments Cons: - I am kind of nitpicking here but the only thing that is bothering me is their dedicated server selection. Sometimes the servers just get taken fast. So if you find the server you like check if there are any in stock.

name: customer
review_body: Very professional, friendly, flexible service. Only adding hosting side DNS management could make it even better. Anyway all good, definite 5+

name: joel
review_body: Cherry Servers is a good cloud provider. Prices are cheap, but you get excellent hardware and accurate support. When I had issues, they were always there to solve them. The only point where they can improve is the availability of a box in a decent time. For example, often, when you order a dedicated server, it takes more than 15 minutes to pop up. So I hope that can improve on this side. Finally, I really happy to use Cherry Servers !

name: CREADIV
review_body: If you are using SMTP services (emails) the limits are ridiculos - 2 emails sent per machine per hour. The bad thing is that they don't seem to mention these limits before paying for the services. "SMTP error from remote mail server after end of data: 450 4.7.1 Temporary delayed by rate limit for new clients, try later (2/h)" ToS section 6.4. "Cherry Servers reserves the right to monitor outgoing SMTP service traffic for security and spam prevention purposes."

NOTE: They are also a Crypto Proof of Stake (PoS) Validator Friendly service provider for their bare metal boxes!
